TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Transaction extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class Transaction Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
type Transaction = class interface IDisposable interface ISerializable

summary.span: 表示事务。

span.span: Represents a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间提供基于 类的显式编程模型和使用 类的隐式编程模型，在后一种模型中，事务由该基础结构自动管理。The namespace provides both an explicit programming model based on the class, as well as an implicit programming model using the class, in which transactions are automatically managed by the infrastructure. 我们强烈建议使用隐式模型变得更容易进行开发。We recommend highly that you use the easier implicit model for development. 若要开始，请参阅[实现隐式 Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主题。To get started, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 编写事务应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[Writing A Transactional Application](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/writing-a-transactional-application.md)。For more information on writing a transactional application, see [Writing A Transactional Application](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/writing-a-transactional-application.md). 类包含由开发人员实现用于登记的资源管理器使用的方法。The class contains methods used by developers implementing resource managers for enlistment. 它还提供用于克隆事务和控制的当前事务上下文的功能。It also provides functionalities for cloning a transaction and controlling the current transaction context. 你可以获取当前事务，如果已设置，使用静态属性。You can obtain the current transaction, if one is set, using the static property.

span.span: This type is thread safe.
Participating in a Transaction

summary.span: 创建事务的克隆。

span.span: Creates a clone of the transaction.

returns.span: 一个 作为当前事务对象的副本。

span.span: A that is a copy of the current transaction object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建克隆传递的事务。Clones are created to pass transactions. 例如，您可能不想要传递对其他应用程序，因为你不希望其他人提交您的事务。For example, you might not want to pass a to other applications, because you do not want others to commit your transaction. 如果您尝试封送或序列化事务，克隆为你自动创建。If you try to marshal or serialize a transaction, a clone is created for you automatically.

member this.Current : System.Transactions.Transaction with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置环境事务。

span.span: Gets or sets the ambient transaction.
A that describes the current transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关环境事务的详细信息，请参阅"管理事务流使用 TransactionScopeOption"部分[实现隐式事务使用事务范围](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主题。For more information on ambient transactions, please see the "Managing transaction flow using TransactionScopeOption" section of the [Implementing an Implicit Transaction using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 尽管您可以设置使用此属性的环境事务，则应使用对象操作的环境事务，只要有可能。Although you can set the ambient transaction using this property, you should use the object to manipulate the ambient transaction whenever possible. 此属性是静态的线程。This property is thread static. 如果更改使用此属性内的环境事务时，将引发调用时，并还原以前的环境事务值。If you change the ambient transaction using this property inside a an is thrown when is called, and the previous ambient transaction value is restored.

summary.span: 创建事务的依赖复本。

span.span: Creates a dependent clone of the transaction.

returns.span: 一个 表示依赖克隆。

span.span: A that represents the dependent clone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依赖事务是其结果取决于其克隆该事务的结果的事务。A dependent transaction is a transaction whose outcome depends on the outcome of the transaction from which it was cloned. `cloneoption`参数控制要创建的依赖事务种类。The `cloneoption` parameter controls what kind of dependent transaction to create. 如果使用创建依赖的事务，它阻止事务的提交过程，直到事务超时或上调用。If a dependent transaction is created with , it blocks the commit process of the transaction until the transaction times out, or is called on the . 如果使用创建，它会自动中止事务如果之前，调用上调用。If it is created with , it automatically aborts the transaction if is called before is called on the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建依赖的事务。The following example shows you how to create a dependent transaction. [!code-csharp[Tx_DependentTx#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_dependenttx/cs/dependenttx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Tx_DependentTx#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_dependenttx/vb/dependenttx.vb#1)]

span.span: Manage Concurrency with DependentTransaction

summary.span: 登记持久资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a durable resource manager to participate in a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **请注意**此方法使用若要阻止该调用来自不受信任的代码; 但是，只有直接调用方需要拥有`FullTrust`权限集。**Note** This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

summary.span: 登记支持两阶段提交的持久资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a durable resource manager that supports two phase commit to participate in a transaction.
An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与持久登记的资源管理器必须能够在他们遇到故障执行恢复。Resource managers with a durable enlistment must be able to perform recovery if they experience a failure. 有关恢复的详细信息，请参阅[Performing Recovery](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691)。For more information on recovery, see [Performing Recovery](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691). 易失性的持久资源，以及如何登记的资源的详细信息，请参阅[Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 资源管理器如何响应提交通知并准备在两阶段提交的提交的详细信息，请参阅[Committing A Transaction 转换中 Single-Phase and Multi-phase](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit in two-phase commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d). 通过此方法参与事务中登记的资源管理器接收对应于上定义的方法的两阶段提交通知接口。Resource managers enlisted for participation in a transaction through this method receive two phase commit notifications that correspond to the methods defined on the interface.

summary.span: 登记支持单阶段提交优化的持久资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a durable resource manager that supports single phase commit optimization to participate in a transaction.
An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与持久登记的资源管理器必须能够在他们遇到故障执行恢复。Resource managers with a durable enlistment must be able to perform recovery if they experience a failure. 有关恢复的详细信息，请参阅[Performing Recovery](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691)。For more information on recovery, see [Performing Recovery](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691). 易失性的持久资源，以及如何登记的资源的详细信息，请参阅[Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 您应该注意，即使使用此方法登记资源管理器实现，也不能保证它将接收单阶段提交。You should note that even when your resource manager implementation enlists with this method, it is not guaranteed that it receives a single phase commit. 事务管理器仍可改为发送两阶段提交通知。The transaction manager can still send two phase commit notifications instead. 单阶段提交优化的详细信息，请参阅[优化使用单阶段提交和 Promotable Single Phase Notification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85))。For more information on the single phase commit optimization, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85)).

summary.span: 对资源管理器进行登记，该资源管理器具有使用可提升的单阶段登记 (PSPE) 的内部事务。

span.span: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).

MemberSignature.Value: public bool EnlistPromotableSinglePhase (System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification promotableSinglePhaseNotification, Guid promoterType);

param.name: promotableSinglePhaseNotification
param.span: 由参与者实现的 接口。

span.span: A interface implemented by the participant.

param.name: promoterType
param.span: 分布式事务处理器的类型。

span.span: The type of the distributed transaction processor.

summary.span: 对资源管理器进行登记，该资源管理器具有使用可提升的单阶段登记 (PSPE) 的内部事务。

span.span: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).

returns.span: 描述登记的 接口实现。

span.span: A interface implementation that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的值`promoterType`参数是`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`，该事务**必须**msdtc 提升并`byte[]`从返回`IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote`方法**必须**为 MSDTC 事务传播标记。If the value specified for the `promoterType` parameter is `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`, the transaction **must** be promoted by MSDTC and the `byte[]` returned from the `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote` method **must** be an MSDTC transaction propagation token. 如果指定的值`promoterType`参数是**不**`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDTC`，将不升级该事务，msdtc，而是由调用方的实现`IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification`。If the value specified for the `promoterType` parameter is **not**`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDTC`, the transaction will not be promoted by MSDTC, but rather by the caller's implementation of `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification`. 如果此调用是成功，则将返回对事务的后续操作的一组`TransactionPromotionException`。If this call is successful, there is a set of subsequent operations on the transaction that will return a `TransactionPromotionException`. 这些操作包括：These operations are: - `Transaction.EnlistDurable` - `TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction` - `TransactionInterop.GetExportCookie` - `TransctionInterop.GetTransmitterPropagationToken` - 事务对象的序列化Serialization of a Transaction object

summary.span: 对资源管理器进行登记，该资源管理器具有使用可提升的单阶段登记 (PSPE) 的内部事务。

span.span: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).

returns.span: 描述登记的 接口实现。

span.span: A interface implementation that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在事务中的登记是易失性;也就是说，它们不会保留失败的参与者。Enlistments in a transaction are volatile; that is, they do not survive the failure of the participant. 此外，此方法仅建议事务管理器，若要提交有关控件，但升级本身不能保证。In addition, this method only suggests the transaction manager to escalate control, but the escalation itself is not guaranteed. 如果升级失败，不会通知用户，并回滚事务。If escalation fails, the user is not notified and the transaction is rolled back. 参数`promotableSinglePhaseNotification`用于与事务管理器通信尝试提交资源管理器的内部事务的结果。The parameter `promotableSinglePhaseNotification` is used to communicate to the transaction manager the outcome of attempting to commit the resource manager's internal transaction. 如果不一致的数据进行报告后，事务管理器将引发异常。If inconsistent data is reported, the transaction manager throws an exception. 如果报告结果，事务管理器查找其自身内部登记中的结果通知，并忽略报告的响应。If an outcome is reported, the transaction manager looks for the outcome notification in its own internal enlistment and ignores the reported response. 有关登记和升级的事务的详细信息，请参阅[Transaction Management Escalation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7)。For more information on enlistments and escalation of a transaction, please see [Transaction Management Escalation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7). 有关 PSPE 的更多信息，请参阅[优化使用单个 Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85))。For more information on PSPE, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85)). **请注意**此方法使用若要阻止该调用来自不受信任的代码; 但是，只有直接调用方需要拥有`FullTrust`权限集。**Note** This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

summary.span: 登记可变资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a volatile resource manager to participate in a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 易失性资源管理器不能从以完成所参与的事务的故障中恢复。Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating. 易失性的持久资源，以及如何登记的资源的详细信息，请参阅[Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 资源管理器如何响应提交通知并准备提交的详细信息，请参阅[Committing A Transaction 转换中 Single-Phase and Multi-phase](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d).

summary.span: 登记在事务中支持两阶段提交参与的易失性资源管理器。

span.span: Enlists a volatile resource manager that supports two phase commit to participate in a transaction.
An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 易失性资源管理器不能从以完成所参与的事务的故障中恢复。Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating. 若要获得持久登记在事务中的，使用方法。To obtain a durable enlistment in a transaction, use the method. 通过此方法参与事务中登记的资源管理器接收对应于上定义的方法的两阶段提交通知接口。Resource managers enlisted for participation in a transaction through this method receive two phase commit notifications that correspond to the methods defined on the interface. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的实现接口，以及该对象登记为参与者在事务中使用方法。The following example shows an implementation of interface, as well as enlisting the object as a participant in a transaction using the method. [!code-csharp[Tx_Enlist#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/cs/enlist.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Tx_Enlist#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/vb/enlist.vb#1)]

summary.span: 登记支持单阶段提交优化的可变资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a volatile resource manager that supports single phase commit optimization to participate in a transaction.
An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 易失性资源管理器不能从以完成所参与的事务的故障中恢复。Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating. 若要获得持久登记在事务中的，使用方法。To obtain a durable enlistment in a transaction, use the method. 易失性的持久资源，以及如何登记的资源的详细信息，请参阅[Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 资源管理器如何响应提交通知并准备提交的详细信息，请参阅[Committing A Transaction 转换中 Single-Phase and Multi-phase](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d). 您应该注意，即使使用此方法登记资源管理器实现，也不能保证它将接收单阶段提交。You should note that even when your resource manager implementation enlists with this method, it is not guaranteed that it receives a single phase commit. 事务管理器仍可改为发送两阶段提交通知。The transaction manager can still send two phase commit notifications instead. 单阶段提交优化的详细信息，请参阅[优化使用单阶段提交和 Promotable Single Phase Notification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85))。For more information on the single phase commit optimization, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85)).

span.span: Implementing A Resource Manager

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] GetPromotedToken ();
.method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetPromotedToken() cil managed
Public Function GetPromotedToken () As Byte()
public: cli::array <System::Byte> ^ GetPromotedToken();
member this.GetPromotedToken : unit -> byte[]

summary.span: 获取提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回的 byte []。

span.span: Gets the byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

returns.span: 提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回的 byte []。

span.span: The byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有副作用，即如果不升级导致的事务提升。This method has the side effect of causing promotion of the transaction if it is not already promoted. 所返回的格式`byte[]`的值进行定义`Transation.PromoterType`属性。The format of the returned `byte[]` is defined by the value of the `Transation.PromoterType` property. 如果的值`Transaction.PromoterType`属性是`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`或`Guid.Empty`，然后`byte[]`此方法返回的是 MSDTC 传输器传播标记。If the value of the `Transaction.PromoterType` property is `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc` or `Guid.Empty`, then the `byte[]` returned by this method is an MSDTC transmitter propagation token. 任何其他值`Transaction.PromoterType`属性指定的调用方定义的格式`Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`指定属性类型值。Any other value for the `Transaction.PromoterType` property specifies a format that is defined by the caller of `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` that specified the property type value. 为了解释与提升后令牌在此后一种情况下，你将需要查阅文档以获取所做的代码`EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`调用。In order to interpret the promoted token in this latter case, you will need to consult the documentation for the code that made the `EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` call.

summary.span: 获取事务的隔离级别。

span.span: Gets the isolation level of the transaction.

value.span: 值之一，该值指示事务的隔离级别。

span.span: One of the values that indicates the isolation level of the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事务的隔离级别确定的其他事务会具有事务前的易失性数据的访问级别完成。The isolation level of a transaction determines what level of access other transactions have to volatile data before a transaction completes. 有关隔离级别的详细信息，请参阅的文档枚举。For more information about isolation levels, see the documentation for the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public Guid PromoterType { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Guid PromoterType
Public ReadOnly Property PromoterType As Guid
public: property Guid PromoterType { Guid get(); };
member this.PromoterType : Guid

summary.span: 对提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回的 byte [] 的格式进行唯一标识。

span.span: Uniquely identifies the format of the byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

value.span: Guid 的格式进行唯一标识byte []提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回。

span.span: A guid that uniquely identifies the format of the byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该事务尚未升级，并且尚不具有可提升的单阶段登记，此属性的值将为`Guid.Empty`。If the transaction has not yet been promoted and does not yet have a promotable single phase enlistment, the value of this property will be `Guid.Empty`. 如果事务已被或将被提升到 MSDTC，则此属性的值将为`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`。If the transaction has been or will be promoted to MSDTC, then the value of this property will be `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`. 如果事务已被或非 MSDTC 提升程序将升级，此属性的值将为早期调用指定的值`Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`。If the transaction has been or will be promoted by a non-MSDTC promoter, the value of this property will be the value specified to an earlier call to `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`.

summary.span: 回滚（中止）事务。

span.span: Rolls back (aborts) the transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Rollback ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Rollback() cil managed
Public Sub Rollback ()
public: void Rollback();
member this.Rollback : unit -> unit

summary.span: 回滚（中止）事务。

span.span: Rolls back (aborts) the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事务对象的任何副本可以通过调用此方法启动事务的回滚。Any copy of a transaction object can initiate the rollback of the transaction by calling this method. 仅原始事务对象，它是对象，可用于启动尝试提交事务。Only the original transaction object, which is a object, can be used to initiate an attempt to commit the transaction. 已确定该事务的结果后调用此方法时，将引发异常。An exception is thrown when this method is called after the outcome of the transaction has already been determined.

summary.span: 设置由非 MSDTC 提升程序生成的分布式事务标识符。

span.span: Sets the distributed transaction identifier generated by the non-MSDTC promoter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅成功调用此方法虽然`IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote`正在处理方法。This method can only be called successfully while the `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote` method is being processed. 如果在其他任何时间，调用此方法`TransactionException`引发。If this method is called at any other time, a `TransactionException` is thrown. 指定的值`promotableNotification`参数必须是同一个对象是最初指定为`Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`调用。The specified value of the `promotableNotification` parameter must be the same object that was originally specified to the `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` invocation. 如果这不是这种情况，则`InvalidOperationException`引发。If this is not the case, then an `InvalidOperationException` is thrown.

summary.span: 指示事务已完成。

span.span: Indicates that the transaction is completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以注册此事件而不是使用可变登记要获取其事务的结果信息。You can register for this event instead of using a volatile enlistment to get outcome information for transactions. 将参数传递给委托是实例。The parameter passed to the delegate is a instance. 然后，可以查询要获取的实例的特定实例的属性，其属性包含与事务的状态或值。You can then query the property of the specific instance to get an instance of , whose property contains the status of a transaction with either the or value. **警告：** 对注册此事件造成负面影响的事务附加到的性能。**Caution** Signing up for this event negatively affects the performance of the transaction it is attached to. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何应用程序可以通过订阅获得事务的结果事件。The following sample shows how an application can obtain the outcome of a transaction by subscribing to the event. [!code-csharp[Tx_Outcome#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_outcome/cs/txoutcome.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Tx_Outcome#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_outcome/vb/txoutcome.vb#1)]

exception.span: 尝试在已处置的事务上订阅此事件。

span.span: An attempt to subscribe this event on a transaction that has been disposed.

Public ReadOnly Property TransactionInformation As TransactionInformation

member this.TransactionInformation : System.Transactions.TransactionInformation

summary.span: 检索有关某个事务的附加信息。

span.span: Retrieves additional information about a transaction.

value.span: 包含有关某个事务的附加信息的 。

span.span: A that contains additional information about the transaction.
